title: Reflective Weekly Reflection Program for Strengthening Online Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A VR simulation-based science education course conducted in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can record their learning progress at over 80% completion by writing weekly reflective journals.
Learners can set individualized goals and establish action plans within 48 hours after an exam.
Learners can enhance problem-solving abilities by applying self-regulated learning strategies three or more times during VR simulation tasks.
Learners can revise their learning strategies two or more times based on peer and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
